about_the_game:
We are proud to host in Alexandria - The port of Worlds, the Cannes XR film festival for 2022. With this DLC you get to access the full CannesXR curated program of immersive experiences for 2022 !
The experiences included and can be viewed are:

Madame Pirate: Becoming a Legend - Serendipity Films
Lavrynthos - Delirium XR
Glimpse - Mr Kite Ltd/ Albyon
Delightful Garden VR - Sights of Sins by Hieronymus Bosch - videoreality GmbH
Red Tail EP.1 - Zero One Film, Funique VR, Kaohsiung Film Archive, Taiwan Public Television Service Foundation
The Passengers - Couzin Films, Les Produits Frais
End of Night - A Makropol production - in co-production with Novelab
The Starry Sand Beach - Lucid Realities
Barnstormers: Determined to Win - Logic Grip Inc.
Déjà-vu - Raumkapsel Animation

Join us for a journey into the realms of culture and storytelling.

name: Alexandria - Cannes XR Festival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 8th gen intel i5 processor or AMD Ryzen 5 3500
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 65 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 10th gen intel i5 processor or AMD Ryzen 3600X
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 3070 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 65 GB available space

short_description: Cannes XR DLC allows access to the third floor in Alexandria - Port of Worlds. With this DLC you get access to the full Cannes XR curated program of immersive experiences for 2022 ! Join us for a journey into the realms of culture and storytelling.
